I always get stopped and get compliments over this dress! So comfortable too!

I always admired the 50s and 60s fashions. This is perfect to bring that style to my little girl. It fits perfectly not too tight not too loose true to size just don’t forget to purchase a slip to go underneath to give it poof. It has natural flare so when dancing you will see the flow of the dress I love it. I bought two more.
Wrinkle resistant, love that it has some stretch that improves the shape.  Issue with the bottom hem.

This dress... is absolutely beautiful.  It's soft and stretchy but does NOT LOOK CHEAP at all.  I wore this vas part of an I Love Lucy costume for Halloween but I would definitely wear this dress just as a regular outfit.  I wore crinolines underneath to give the skirt that 50's style "floof" and it was so much fun to wear!  I will probably get another dress like this with another pattern as well.

评论概述: Feel like a star in this!
评论详情: Excellent vintage-style dress... wore to costume party and felt like was truly back in the 50's!
Adorable! My daughter loves it. Using it as Betty Boop costume dress.

评论概述: Cute dress, but didn't fit me well.
评论详情: This is a cute dress with a vintage 1950s look.  The fabric is stretchy, forgiving, and comfortable.  It would be really cute one someone with the right build.  I felt like the dress's big, heart-shaped buttons made it look at bit more like a costume, but that's a matter of taste.  Others may think it adds to the cuteness.  It would be easy to sew on different buttons if you don't like them.  If you're not sure about sizing, it runs big.  I'm 5' 4" and 130 lbs.  The size medium was too big for me.  I had to return it.  I didn't reorder a size small because the dress is cut for women with fuller busts.  The waist of the dress fit well, but the top was too baggy.  My arms came no where close to filling out the sleeves, so the sleeve fabric stuck straight out a bit awkwardly.  The dress fell several inches below my knees (longer than I expected).  If you're petite like me, this dress probably isn't for you. If you're bigger on top and/or tall, this dress would probably be prefect for you!
It’s cute a little tight in boob area, but I make it work with cammie underneath it

评论概述: AMAZING with the fabric feel flaw
评论详情: It appears totally as described! The color is gray. I am 5 foot three and I will wonder hundred pound, so the small fit, but wasn’t too tight. Would definitely fit somebody a little larger. Very very flattering!  Now comes the downside! The fabric is awful! It looks good, but it feels horrible. It’s definitely wearable, but it takes some of the joy away from it. So it definitely works and a warm day. If you’re pretty intolerant to it might not be your best option.
I liked the dress, but it was too small

item runs a bit small but it is made of a very stretchy material that reminds me of a textured running short. it does stretch alot. there is a zipper under the arm on the left side that does not appear to be sewn properly on mine and while wearing it sticks out at the hip. overall its a nice dress i like the material and the stretch was an unexpected bonus

I got this to wear for an I Love Lucy costume in October for my bunco group. I paired it with a red wig. Together this dress made the costume hit. This is well made, with good fabric, no wrinkles and very cute. Cute enough. Cute enough. I may just wear the dress not being a costume

评论概述: returned because it required an iron
评论详情: a little short, but I liked the fit of this dress.  I returned it, though, because I couldn't get the ruffle to lay flat despite multiple dewrinkle cycles in my dryer.  who even owns an iron these days?

评论概述: I like it, but the buttons were hearts?
评论详情: I purchased this dress for a Christmas party but ended up not wearing it because the buttons were not normal buttons, they are heart shaped. It was disappointing and I was upset that it did not show this in the picture. Other than that it fit well, which just made it that much more of a bummer.

评论概述: Too large, and not correct material
评论详情: First off, the dress is very cute. I can't tell how well it's made, as it was clearly too big for me. I think the "waist" in the size guide might be referring to pants waist size which... Isn't usual for dresses, but it would be closer to accurate, so take that into account.  I'm torn on ordering down a size because one reason I went for it was it was listed as 95% cotton, which you can see is not true. It's 0% cotton. I strongly prefer cotton and linen for my dresses and skirts so not sure if I'll reorder or not.  Only two stars for now due to the misleading sizing chart and false claims on the material, but it DOES look nice.

Wore this for engagement party. This dress hugs just right and the material doesn’t cling. I wore spanks and was able to take them off and pig out during the party without fear of my stomach showing, p.s that’s a dumb fear let your body show. This dress was so cute without being campy or uncomfortable.
Good quality and fits perfect!

评论概述: Very stretchy material and fits great
评论详情: I love this dress. Good material with a good stretch and sits well on the body
This dress is absolutely adorable and it fits perfectly It’s hemmed the right length the waist is exactly where it should be and it has a side zip
The dress fit perfectly. I would recommend buying this. It's my most favorite dress.

It’s perfect. I wanted something to help me feel less grumpy while doing house work and it helped!! Perfect material and cut, even for a curvy woman. I’m a 38 D and size XL. I got XL. I can’t wear anything but a “minimizer”/natural bra but it’s cute still. I have thick arms and a strong back and it fits comfortably, but it makes me feel feminine.

Oh my goodness, I adore this dress! I’m tall and thin (5’8/115 lbs with 34D boobs) and have so much trouble finding dresses that fit properly! Either the top fits well and the waist is huge, or the waist fits well and the top is too tight. (Plus, the waistlines on most dresses are usually waaaaay too high for me - like, underbust level.) But not this baby! The top is big enough for my boobs and the waist is small enough to provide shape. (Yes, it’s still technically too high and could stand to be taken in an inch or two, but with the belt, it’s totally doable.) The color is true to the picture, the stretchy, ultra-comfy fabric is a great weight with a nice, wrinkle-resistant drape, and the ruffled retro placket with heart buttons is so fun and feminine! I’m so crazy about this dress that I also ordered it in red polka dots! Now, if it only came in PINK polka dots! (A girl can dream!) 🥰💝🎀

Bought this cute 1950s inspired dress for my 1950s inspired theater show. It was for one of my students and she looks fabulous in it! The material is very durable and stretchy. It fit just right. Under the lights it looked even more gorgeous.

评论概述: Arrived with stains, then the color washed out
评论详情: The fit is very flattering, which is why I have this dress in three colors. Too bad it’s not wearable!!  The red version !arrived! with stains and when I tried to remove them with a Tide pen the result was a huge area of color loss where the dye washed off. Seriously, the dye came out like it was meant to - like washable marker. I’ve never seen ANY other fabric have issue with being treated with a Tide pen.
Adorable and stretchy and so cute but the problem is it has darts in the bust area which if you’re using it for a tween… it may look weird since they can’t fill the area. Had to return.

I'm 5'5 and 129 pounds.  I  ordered a large and it fits great!!! It's has strength material.  Love it!!!!

I love this dress! It fits amazingly, looks so good, is very flattering! It’s good for fancy and casual wear and I love it so much!

Great dress!

Very cute and stylish dress. My daughter wore to her homecoming dance. Got a lot of compliments on it.
I originally ordered a small (I’m 5,3 with a 27 inch waist) it was too small so I sized up. Medium fits perfectly

Hi my name is Katie and it’s been 4 days since my last dress purchase. And OMG  I’m in love. I didn’t realize it had HEART SHAPED BUTTONS when I ordered it. 😍Now I need a Christmas soirée to attend! This is a L. (I’m about an 8 at the moment.) It comes in XS-3X & it has a little stretch. Also I added the belt because I didn’t like the tie it came with. Oh, and I’m wearing my petticoat w it, of course. 😊 I just wish it had pockets. I need to learn how to sew pockets into my dresses.
Perfect for square dancing with a petticoat underneath! The cotton fabric is comfortable and the side zipper is a plus. Love the variety of colors and patterns. I just ordered another one!
I like this dress. It fits well and looks great. I wish the material was a little softer but I can't complain.

Torn between this dress and another, I decided on this one for one simple reason: the heart-shaped buttons! It's a small, unassuming touch, but it's exactly what I wanted to boost the cute, classy retro feeling for my outfit. Ordered this in an XS and it fit very well, a bit loosely, but not to worry -- my little "bow belt" helped cinch it right up!  Adorable dress to get your Audrey Hepburn on and strike a sense of sophistication in both yourself and others: all at a blissfully low cost.

Love this dress! I’m 5.5 and weigh 118 lbs. I bought a medium. I normally wear a small but according to their measurements I am a medium. It fit perfect. The fabric was nice and good quality. There is no give so measure yourself to see what size you should buy.  I did buy a petticoat to go underneath it.
The draft is as pretty as pictured. I bought it for a vintage dress up party bit I will wear it any time! 😃
Dress is pretty, and well made.  Did have some trouble with the buttons, but that probably was due to wearing it every night for a week.  Held up to dancing n stage well.  Very satisfied.
I usually wear a medium, but it was too snug up top. Had to trade it in for a larger. Got several compliments. It looked nice, paired well with a blue jean jacket

I bought this dress for a Halloween costume, but I love it so much that I can't wait to wear it again!  It is a good quality dress for the price and the color is a beautiful shade of green.  It does run small.  I wear a size 14 in dresses and the 2XL was a perfect fit.  The material has a bit of stretch and washed well on the delicate cycle.  I line-dried the dress and there was minimal wrinkling.  There is a side zipper, but unfortunately there are no pockets.  Overall, I'm very pleased.  It is a fun, flirty, retro style dress!
Fits a little bigger than a medium but looks good.
I ordered this for a Halloween costume and honestly that’s all the wear I think this dress would be able to take. Its super thin and honestly not good quality. Also get one size larger

Perfect dress for a 50s party. Only thing I disliked were the heart shaped buttons. They were a bit tacky, but switching them out made the dress just perfect. Size was as expected, comfortable, and flattering.

Very figure flattering and pretty. The material is a little rough and wrinkles easily.  General, overall it is cute and dressy.

This dress was exactly what I was looking for. Not only is it beautiful. The fabric has a little stretch to it (love that) the length was perfect for me, I’m 5’3” (2xl) I added a red petticoat underneath. Great color. No pockets. Fabric was good. Not too thin. I ordered a XL. I could have worn a XXL. I liked the side zipper rather than back zipper easier to put on.
Got this for a dress 50s day, very well made. Very cute
Fits nicely but it had heart shaped buttons that felt childish and unprofessional for what I needed.

I bought this dress for a 1950's party and decided to wear it to work. Everyone loved the dress and asked where I got it! It really is very flattering and fun. The buttons are cute little hearts. One thing is that you'll need to iron the front ruffles after each wash because they stick up.

I purchased the coral dress for a Barbie weekend at work. It fit perfectly! I’m 5’5 and 140lb. I purchased a medium. It has just enough stretch. The coral is more pink than orange. It fit so well I’m buying other colors. The buttons are functioning and there is a side zip to make it easier to get in and out. For extra fullness I got a longer length petticoat for under. I did have to hit with a steamer when I first opened it, but it does not wrinkle after steaming.
Very cute, runs a little small
This is very flattering and well-made. It even makes my arms look skinny lol

I got this dress for a rockabilly Elvis themed wedding I went to in Vegas and it was perfect for the occasion! Fit well, though I’d say if you have a larger chest or arms to size up as I had some gaping on my lower buttons and the sleeves rode up a little. Otherwise I got a ton of compliments, it was comfortable to wear for the night and hugged in all the right places. I paired with white shoes and it was the perfect combo.
I love it!
